```{r}
library(tidyverse)

ggplot(dota = mpg) + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy))
##dota needs to be spelled data 

fliter(mpg, cyl = 8)
filter(diamond, carat > 3)
##Fliter is spelled wrong 
##Diamond needs to be spelled diamonds 
##You need a double == sign near cylinder 
library(tidyverse)

ggplot(data = mpg) + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy))

filter(mpg, cyl == 8)
filter(diamonds, carat > 3)

```
